document_data.name: Air Bubble
document_data.mainbody: '''''Air bubble''''' was a [[spell]] that provided a breath of fresh air.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell created a sphere of air around a targeted creature's head. The caster could choose any creature they could see, up to a maximum range of {{SI|60|ft|long=yes}}. The amount of globes of fresh air created by the spell was determined by the caster's skill level.
document_data.Components: This spell required only a [[somatic component]].
